title: Meta in $27 billion financing deal with Blue Owl Capital for Louisiana data center
description: (Reuters) -Meta has struck a $27 billion financing deal with Blue Owl Capital to fund its biggest data center project globally, as large technology companies race to build out the infrastructure needed to power their artificial intelligence ambitions.

title: OpenAI launches Atlas browser to compete with Google Chrome
description: OpenAI introduced its own web browser, Atlas, on Tuesday, putting the ChatGPT maker in direct competition with Google as more internet users rely on artificial intelligence to answer their questions.

title: GE Vernova to fully own Prolec JV for $5.28 billion in grid supply push
description:
GE Vernova said on Tuesday it would pay $5.28 billion to buy the 50% stake it does not already own in transformer-maker Prolec GE as the artificial intelligence boom fuels grid equipment demand.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI Assistants Mislead in Almost Half of News Responses: EBU-BBC Study
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: OpenAI launches AI-powered browser, ChatGPT Atlas
description: OpenAI launched its first AI-powered web browser, ChatGPT Atlas, on Tuesday, positioning the artificial intelligence giant in direct competition with Google’s Chrome.
content:
OpenAI has launched its own artificial intelligence-powered web browser, ChatGPT Atlas, placing the AI giant in direct competition with Google’s Chrome browser, the company announced Tuesday.

title: Microsoft CEO Gets $96 Million Pay Package on ‘Exceptional’ Year
description: Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella’s pay package jumped to $96.5 million for fiscal 2025, his highest compensation since he became CEO more than a decade ago, with the board citing the company’s progress in artificial intelligence.
